A weed is a plant we've found no use for yet.
God enters by a private door into every individual.
Sunday is the core of our civilization, dedicated to thought and reverence.
The meaning of good and bad, of better and worse, is simply helping or hurting.
When a whole nation is roaring patriotism at the top of its voice, I am fain to explore the cleanness of its hands and the purity of its heart.
We acquire the strength we have overcome.

What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

We change, whether we like it or not.

Whatever course you decide upon, there is always someone to tell you that you are wrong. There are always difficulties arising which tempt you to believe that your critics are right. To map out a course of action and follow it to an end requires courage.
Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
Let me never fall into the vulgar mistake of dreaming that I am persecuted whenever I am contradicted.

Money often costs too much.
Music takes us out of the actual and whispers to us dim secrets that startle our wonder as to who we are, and for what, whence, and whereto.

author: ram-dass
quotes: Suffering is part of our training program for becoming wise.
Don't think about the future. Just be here now. Don't think about the past. Just be here now.
I get rid of the thoughts, and I get in my witness, which is down in my spiritual heart. The witness that witnesses being.
Cosmic humor, especially about your own predicament, is an important part of your journey.
The resistance to the unpleasant situation is the root of suffering.
Your problem is you're... too busy holding onto your unworthiness.
If you feel a sense of social responsibility, first of all keep working on yourself. Being peaceful yourself is the first step if you want to live in a peaceful universe.
Burnout is a state of mind.
The spiritual journey is individual, highly personal. It can't be organized or regulated. It isn't true that everyone should follow one path. Listen to your own truth.
Be patient. You’ll know when it’s time for you to wake up and move ahead.
The Ego is an exquisite instrument. Enjoy it, use it-just don't get lost in it.
You can't build joy on a feeling of self-loathing.
Our actions and states of mind matter, because we are so deeply interconnected with one another.
Suffering is the sandpaper of our incarnation. It does its work of shaping us.
So we won't take ourselves too seriously. Because taking something serious doesn't make it go away any faster. In fact, it keeps making it a little bit worse.
A Oneness of all. An evolution in consciousness of us all that isn't about the egos.
Each of us finds his unique vehicle for sharing with others his bit of wisdom.
In mystical traditions, it is one's own readiness that makes experiences exoteric or esoteric. The secret isn't that you're not being told. The secret is that you're not able to hear.
When you are already in Detroit, you don't have to take a bus to get there.
Accidents are just from where you're looking; to the ego, it looks like it's miracles and accidents.
If you want oneness in society, you have to teach people to go inside instead of going outside, because if they want peace, they need to find it within.
Healing does not mean going back to the way things were before, but rather allowing what is now to move us closer to God.
We're fascinated by the words--but where we meet is in the silence behind them.

A feeling of aversion or attachment toward something is your clue that there's work to be done.
The gift you offer another person is just your being.
The quieter you become, the more you can hear.

You are loved just for being who you are, just for existing. You don't have to do anything to earn it. Your shortcomings, your lack of self-esteem, physical perfection, or social and economic success - none of that matters. No one can take this love away from you, and it will always be here.

If you want to see how enlightened you are, go spend a week with your family.
Witness your thoughts. Your thoughts are attachments.
Coming into the place of Soul-awareness is coming home.

The next message you need is always right where you are.
Don’t compare your path with anybody else’s. Your path is unique to you.

author: ramakrishna
quotes: To work without attachment is to work without the expectation of reward or fear of any punishment in this world or the next. Work so done is a means to the end, and God is the end.

The goal of life is not the earning of money, but the service of God.
The winds of grace are always blowing, but you have to raise the sail.
The winds of grace blow all the time. All we need to do is set our sails.

God can be realized through all paths. All religions are true. The important thing is to reach the roof. You can reach it by stone stairs or by wooden stairs or by bamboo steps or by a rope. You can also climb up by a bamboo pole.

The fabled musk deer searches the world over for the source of the scent which comes from itself.

author: ramana-maharshi

author: rashida-rowe

ife is unpredictable and usually never goes the way we plan it or would like it to go, but we have it and with life anything is possible.

author: ray-charles
quotes: What is a soul? It's like electricity— we don't really know what it is, but it's a force that can light a room.
